title: The Magen
description: Seduced by the curiosity inspired by a strange old manuscript that according to legend has the power to allow its holder to travel through time; Freddy and Gustavo are involved in a completely unexpected journey after a visit to the Museum of History.The Magen, a very powerful and ancient artifact, transports them to an unknown place where they receive help and guidance, while they are entrusted with a very important mission, full of action and suspense, which opens the door to fantastic trips and the discovery of mystical creatures. 8,400 words. Available for free download through the official URL below.
author: Joel Liriano
